ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 127
ygData.msgSnippet: Any enchanter 20th level or over can usually get the best prices for anything expensive from a vendor anywhere in the game. There s a price break at 110 cha
ygData.messageBody:
Any enchanter 20th level or over can usually get the best prices for
anything expensive from a vendor anywhere in the game. There's a price break
at 110 cha and friendly con (rubies are right around 130). I have heard
there is another price break at 170 cha, but that's a lot harder to get. All
you need is an enchanter with a few spare moments in town to buy for you.

Oglug, ~Hand of Chaos~, CT
> Date: Fri, 3 Dec 1999 13:36:06 -0500
> From: "Dan Bouchard" <dbouchar@...>
> Subject: Re: Digest Number 126
>
>
> BAH! Do it the easy way and get the absolute best price possible.
>
> Make a female human enchanter and base her in Freeport. When creating her,
give
> her the maximum possible points in Charisma.
>
> Now, give her your money and have her go to the blue building just outside
the
> area where the bank is and buy the gems. She will fetch the best price
> possible.
>
> -Gaidal Cain
> 36 Barbarian Warrior
> Tarrew Marr
>
>
>
>
>
